sprint_name: Sprint 1: Foundational Profile, Catalog, and CI/CD
sprint_goal: Establish foundational vendor profile, catalog entities, compliance framework, and CI/CD pipeline.
epic_coverage: Vendor Profile & Compliance Management, Vendor Catalog & Inventory Management, Service Infrastructure & DevOps
key_deliverables: Vendor Profile API (CRUD), Business Hours Mgmt, Availability Toggle, Product Category API (CRUD), License Mgmt API, Dockerfile, CI/CD Pipeline, Core Observability.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate API functionality for creating and updating a vendor profile, including business hours and licenses. Showcase a successful CI/CD pipeline run deploying the service to staging.
success_criteria: All foundational APIs are functional and tested. CI/CD pipeline is operational for automated deployments to staging.
risk_factors: Complexity of Transactional Outbox pattern implementation; external dependencies on other teams' services (geofencing, audit).
mitigation_strategies: Architectural review for event-driven patterns; use mocks for external services to unblock development.
burndown_target: Achieve 50% task completion by end of Day 5.

sprint_name: Sprint 2: Core Catalog CRUD & Compliance Automation
sprint_goal: Complete manual product catalog management (CRUD) and automate vendor compliance workflows.
epic_coverage: Vendor Catalog & Inventory Management, Vendor Profile & Compliance Management
key_deliverables: Product CRUD APIs with image upload, soft-delete functionality, automated license expiry reminders, and automated suspension for non-compliant vendors.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate creating, editing, and deleting a product. Showcase the automated suspension of a vendor with an expired license.
success_criteria: Full manual product management is possible via API. The automated compliance job correctly identifies and acts on expiring/expired licenses.
risk_factors: Complexity of cross-service call for product deletion check; reliability of the scheduled job for compliance checks.
mitigation_strategies: Implement circuit breakers for cross-service calls; add robust monitoring and alerting for the scheduled job.
external_dependencies: Order Management Service API (for active order check)
integration_windows: Integration testing for compliance job in the final week.
burndown_target: Linear burndown, with focus on product CRUD in week 1 and compliance automation in week 2.

sprint_goal: Launch bulk catalog import feature, including robust validation and error reporting.
key_deliverables: CSV import functionality with S3 pre-signed URLs, asynchronous processing via SQS, detailed row-by-row validation, and generation of a downloadable error report. High-performance batch inventory check API.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate uploading a CSV with mixed valid/invalid data. Show the successful creation of valid products and download/review the generated error report for failed rows.
success_criteria: The entire bulk import workflow is E2E testable and handles errors gracefully. The inventory check API meets its strict performance SLO.
risk_factors: High complexity of the import worker logic, including atomic transactions for bulk operations and efficient parsing. Potential for performance bottlenecks.
mitigation_strategies: Extensive unit testing for the validation service. Load testing the worker process with large CSV files in staging.
burndown_target: Focus on the core worker and validation logic in week 1, with error reporting and testing in week 2.

sprint_goal: Deliver internal onboarding tools and vendor catalog export functionality.
key_deliverables: Asynchronous CSV export feature with notifications and secure download links. A standalone CLI script for the onboarding team to transform vendor spreadsheets. Admin APIs for validating migrated data.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate triggering a catalog export and downloading the resulting CSV. Run the CLI transformation script on a sample vendor file. Showcase the admin APIs for migration validation via Postman/Swagger.
success_criteria: Export and internal script tools are functional and tested. Admin validation APIs are ready for frontend integration.
risk_factors: Complexity of streaming large datasets for export. Usability of the CLI tool for the non-technical onboarding team.
mitigation_strategies: Performance test the export worker. Conduct a UAT session for the CLI script with the onboarding team before finalizing.
integration_windows: UAT for CLI script in week 2.
